						MONDAY 16 APRIL 22:30 BST - BBC TWO


						FROM GAVIN ESLER
					
					Hello, 



						In tonight's programme:


VIRGINIA SHOOTING


News coming in now of at least 22 people dead at Virginia Tech - a large university in the States. We'll have the latest on the programme.


DES BROWNE


Des Browne - the aftermath. He stays as Defence secretary - but for how long? We have an opinion poll asking whether he should resign. And - much more importantly - what is the impact on British forces serving in very dangerous conditions in Iraq and the seas around Iraq? 


MORE FROM MIDDLE EARTH 


A new book from J R R Tolkien - years after his death - we have access to the book and a previously unbroadcast interview with J R R Tolkien himself. 


AMAZONIA 


And: they tear down paradise, put up a parking lot - the new roads cutting through the Amazon - development versus environment. 


Newsnight is at 10.30pm on BBC2


Gavin
